subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Mo Farah of Great Britain, who had never raced a half marathon, edged Gebre Gebremariam in the New York City Half Marathon. Caroline Rotich of Kenya won the women’s race.
snippet: Mo Farah of Great Britain, who had never raced a half marathon, edged Gebre Gebremariam in the New York City Half Marathon. Caroline Rotich of Kenya won the women’s race.
